statements: SELECT * FROM CandidateProfiles;
SELECT full_name, email, experience_years FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE address = 'New York';
SELECT candidate_id, full_name, phone_number FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE skills @> ARRAY['Java'];
SELECT full_name, email, education FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE address LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY experience_years ASC
SELECT full_name, skills FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE skills @> ARRAY['Python'] AND education @> ARRAY['Bachelor']
SELECT count(candidate_id) AS total_candidates, experience_years FROM CandidateProfiles GROUP BY experience_years HAVING count(candidate_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_candidates DESC
SELECT * FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE experience_years < 3 AND (skills @> ARRAY['Java'] OR skills @> ARRAY['React']) ORDER BY full_name
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT name, email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone FROM candidate_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_resumes WHERE candidate_id = 2;
SELECT id, resume FROM candidate_resumes ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM candidate_profiles WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT name, phone FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT name, email FROM candidate_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CandidateProfiles;
SELECT full_name, email, location FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE experience_years > 3;
SELECT id, full_name, phone_number FROM CandidateProfiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT full_name, skills FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE education = 'Master's Degree';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM CandidateProfiles;
SELECT * FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE skills @> ARRAY['Python', 'SQL']
SELECT full_name, email, experience_years FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE experience_years > 2 ORDER BY experience_years DESC
SELECT full_name, skills[1], experience_years FROM CandidateProfiles WHERE skills[1] = 'JavaScript' AND education = 'Bachelor'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_candidates FROM CandidateProfiles

SELECT CandidateProfiles.full_name, HiringManagers.full_name, HiringManagers.department FROM CandidateProfiles JOIN HiringManagers ON CandidateProfiles.location = HiringManagers.department ORDER BY CandidateProfiles.full_name
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT first_name, email, phone_number FROM candidate_resumes WHERE experience CONTAINS 'Software Development';
SELECT manager_id, department FROM hiring_managers ORDER BY manager_id DESC;
SELECT last_name, email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 2;
SELECT interview_date, feedback FROM candidate_interviews WHERE candidate_id = 1 AND manager_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, address FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 1
SELECT resume_text, skills, experience, education FROM candidate_resumes WHERE candidate_id = 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM hiring_managers ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM candidate_interviews WHERE interview_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interview_date DESC

SELECT candidate_profiles.first_name, hiring_managers.department, candidate_interviews.feedback FROM candidate_profiles JOIN candidate_interviews ON candidate_profiles.candidate_id = candidate_interviews.candidate_id JOIN hiring_managers ON candidate_interviews.manager_id = hiring_managers.manager_id WHERE candidate_profiles.last_name = 'Smith'
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT name, email FROM candidates WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT candidate_id, name, email, phone_number FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_id DESC;
SELECT name, email, resume FROM candidates WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM experiences WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT name, email FROM candidates ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT candidate_id, name, email, phone_number FROM candidates WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT candidate_id, name, resume FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 3;
SELECT e.experience_id, e.company_name, c.name AS candidate_name FROM experiences AS e JOIN candidates AS c ON e.candidate_id = c.candidate_id;
